tools.detailed_description: A PNNL-developed implementation of Dynamic Graph Neural Networks tailored for molecular data, enabling advanced property prediction tasks.

tools.name: eToxPred
tools.one_line_profile: Predictor for general toxicity and synthetic accessibility
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed to predict the general toxicity of small molecules and calculate their synthetic accessibility (SA) scores, aiding in the filtering of drug candidates.

tools.name: GNNImplicitSolvent
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit solvent model based on GNNs for Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A tool from Riniker Lab that implements a Generalized Born implicit solvent model using Transferable Graph Neural Networks, designed to accelerate Molecular Dynamics simulations.

tools.name: ACANet
tools.one_line_profile: Activity-Cliff Awareness Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that incorporates activity-cliff awareness to improve the robustness of graph learning for molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: HMGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Molecular Graph Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a Heterogeneous Molecular Graph Neural Network for learning molecular representations and predicting properties.

tools.name: openDMPK
tools.one_line_profile: Open source toolkit for DMPK property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and data resource for predicting Drug Metabolism and Pharmacokinetics (DMPK) properties of small molecules, aiding in lead optimization.

tools.name: PAR-NeurIPS21
tools.one_line_profile: Property-Aware Relation Networks for few-shot molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Property-Aware Relation Networks (PAR) designed for few-shot molecular property prediction tasks, as presented at NeurIPS 2021.

tools.name: GROVER
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised graph transformer for molecular representation and property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of GROVER (Graph Representation from self-supervised Message Passing Transformer), a large-scale pre-trained model for molecular representation learning and property prediction.

tools.name: openNCA
tools.one_line_profile: R package for non-compartmental pharmacokinetic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A computation engine provided as an R package for generating pharmacokinetic parameter estimates using non-compartmental analysis (NCA) methods.

tools.name: transkit
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacokinetic simulation tools for hormone therapy
tools.detailed_description: A set of pharmacokinetic tools and Jupyter notebooks designed for simulating and analyzing transgender hormone therapy regimens.

tools.name: nlmixr2autoinit
tools.one_line_profile: Automated initial estimates for population PK modeling
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the automatic generation of initial estimates for population pharmacokinetic modelling, developed by UCL Pharmacometrics.

tools.name: soapgp
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction using Gaussian Processes with SOAP kernel
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation for predicting molecular properties using Gaussian Processes (GP) combined with the Smooth Overlap of Atomic Positions (SOAP) kernel.

tools.name: Knowledge-based-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: K-BERT model for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Knowledge-based BERT (K-BERT) adapted for molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: MolCLR
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Contrastive Learning of Representations via GNNs
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch Geometric implementation of MolCLR, a framework for molecular contrastive learning of representations using Graph Neural Networks for downstream property prediction.

tools.name: GLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive graph learning for molecular interactions and properties
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of GLAM (Graph Learning with Adaptive Mechanisms) for automated molecular interactions and properties predictions.

tools.name: MGSSL
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning for molecules
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the NeurIPS'21 paper 'Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning for Molecular Property Prediction', focusing on motif-level self-supervision.

tools.name: MXMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Mechanics-Driven Graph Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: Source code for MXMNet, a graph neural network that integrates molecular mechanics knowledge for predicting molecular properties and structures.

tools.name: Molecular-graph-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised BERT for molecular graph property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A semi-supervised learning framework utilizing BERT architecture on molecular graphs for property prediction tasks.

tools.name: Meta-MGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Meta-MGNN, a meta-learning framework combined with Graph Neural Networks for few-shot molecular property prediction.

tools.name: ChemicalX
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for drug-drug interaction, polypharmacy side effect, and synergy prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library designed for drug pair scoring tasks, enabling the prediction of drug-drug interactions, polypharmacy side effects, and drug synergy using state-of-the-art deep learning models.

tools.name: GuacaMol
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for de novo molecular design models
tools.detailed_description: An evaluation framework for assessing the quality and diversity of molecules generated by de novo design models, providing a suite of standardized benchmarks for distribution learning and goal-directed generation.

tools.name: GuacaMol Baselines
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline generative models for the GuacaMol benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A collection of baseline implementations for molecular generation, including SMILES LSTM, VAE, and genetic algorithms, designed to serve as reference points for the GuacaMol benchmarking framework.

tools.name: FastJTNNpy3
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized Python 3 implementation of Junction Tree VAE for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: An optimized implementation of the Junction Tree Variational Autoencoder (JT-VAE) for generating valid molecular graphs, supporting Bayesian optimization for drug-like molecule discovery.

tools.name: GCPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete SE(3)-equivariant perceptron network for 3D graphs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework implementing SE(3)-equivariant networks for processing 3D geometric graphs, particularly useful for protein structure analysis and modeling.

tools.name: GCPNet-EMA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure accuracy estimation using GCPNet
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating the accuracy of predicted protein structures (EMA) using Geometry-Complete Perceptron Networks, aiding in the quality assessment of protein models.

tools.name: bio-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete diffusion model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a geometry-complete diffusion generative model (GCDM) designed for generating and optimizing 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: GGME
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation metrics for graph generative models
tools.detailed_description: A library providing practical solutions and metrics for evaluating graph generative models, addressing pitfalls in standard evaluation procedures for molecular graphs.

tools.name: Polygraph Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for graph generative models
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to benchmark various graph generative models, facilitating the comparison of different approaches in molecular and graph generation.

tools.name: PES-Learn
tools.one_line_profile: Automated generation of ML models for molecular potential energy surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A software package that automates the generation of machine learning models for molecular potential energy surfaces (PES) by sampling geometries and running quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: AlphaDrug
tools.one_line_profile: Protein target-specific de novo molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating novel drug molecules specifically targeted to a protein of interest, employing generative models for targeted drug design.

tools.name: ConfGF
tools.one_line_profile: Learning gradient fields for molecular conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a score-based generative model that learns gradient fields to generate stable and energetically favorable molecular conformations.

tools.name: ESM-S
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-informed protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that incorporates structural information, useful for tasks such as inverse folding and protein sequence design.

tools.name: TorchDrug
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning platform for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive machine learning platform designed for drug discovery, covering tasks related to graphs, proteins, and molecules, providing a unified interface for various datasets and models.

tools.name: Mol-AIR
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular reinforcement learning with adaptive intrinsic reward
tools.detailed_description: A reinforcement learning-based tool for goal-directed molecular generation that utilizes adaptive intrinsic rewards to improve exploration and optimization.

tools.name: molvecgen
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular vectorization and batch generation library
tools.detailed_description: A library for vectorizing molecules (SMILES) and generating batches for training deep learning models in cheminformatics.

tools.name: PKU_MDAgent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based agent for molecular dynamics automation
tools.detailed_description: An agent based on Large Language Models designed to generate code and automate molecular dynamics simulations for obtaining material thermodynamic parameters.

tools.name: Swarm-CG
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic parametrization of bonded terms in coarse-grained models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automatic parametrization of bonded terms in MARTINI-based coarse-grained molecular models using Fuzzy Self-Tuning Particle Swarm Optimization.

tools.name: CDGS
tools.one_line_profile: Conditional Diffusion model on Discrete Graph Structures for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A conditional diffusion model based on discrete graph structures designed for molecular graph generation, enabling the generation of molecules with specific desired properties.

tools.name: ACSConv
tools.one_line_profile: Plug-and-play converter for 2D pre-trained models to 3D for medical imaging
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables the conversion of standard 2D pre-trained deep learning models into 3D counterparts, facilitating their application in 3D medical imaging tasks like volumetric segmentation.

tools.name: molecule-autoencoder
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous representation of molecules for optimization and design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a variational autoencoder (VAE) for molecules, allowing for the conversion of discrete molecular structures into a continuous latent space for optimization and property prediction.

tools.name: DrugGEN
tools.one_line_profile: Target-specific de novo drug design using Graph Transformer GANs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework utilizing Graph Transformer-based Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for the de novo design of drug candidate molecules tailored to specific protein targets.

tools.name: MolRL-MGPT
tools.one_line_profile: De novo drug design using Reinforcement Learning with Multiple GPT Agents
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining reinforcement learning with multiple GPT-based agents to generate and optimize molecular structures for drug discovery.

tools.name: MADGEN
tools.one_line_profile: Mass-spec constrained de novo molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that utilizes mass spectrometry data to guide the de novo generation of molecular structures, aiding in structure elucidation and identification.

tools.name: controlled-peptide-generation
tools.one_line_profile: Controllable deep generative models for antimicrobial peptide discovery
tools.detailed_description: A framework for accelerating antimicrobial peptide discovery using controllable deep generative models coupled with molecular dynamics simulations to screen and optimize candidates.

tools.name: GOFA
tools.one_line_profile: Generative One-For-All model for joint graph language modeling
tools.detailed_description: A generative framework capable of handling various graph-related tasks, including molecular graph generation and modeling, through a unified language modeling approach.

tools.name: PINNs-based-MPC
tools.one_line_profile: Nonlinear model predictive control using Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework implementing nonlinear model predictive control (NMPC) for multi-body dynamics by approximating system dynamics using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs).

tools.name: Argenomic
tools.one_line_profile: Quality-diversity algorithm for small molecule optimization
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a quality-diversity (illumination) algorithm designed for the exploration and optimization of small organic molecules.

tools.name: Bayesian-Illumination
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated generative model for small molecule optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian Illumination approach for accelerating the generative optimization of small molecules, focusing on diverse and high-quality molecular discovery.

tools.name: paper2lkg
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for transforming academic papers into Local Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to extract structured information from academic papers and construct local Knowledge Graphs (KG), facilitating scientific literature mining.

tools.name: LH2Transfer
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of Liquid Hydrogen transfer and boil-off losses
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based simulation tool for quantifying transfer and boil-off losses in Liquid Hydrogen (LH2) supply chains, enabling optimization of storage and refueling infrastructure.

tools.name: DrugFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-domain distribution learning for de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: A flow-based generative model for de novo drug design that leverages multi-domain distribution learning to generate novel drug candidates.

tools.name: AI4Sci-MiCaM
tools.one_line_profile: De novo molecular generation via connection-aware motif mining
tools.detailed_description: A molecular generation framework that uses connection-aware motif mining to construct chemically valid and optimized molecules, as presented at ICLR 2023.

tools.name: poli-baselines
tools.one_line_profile: Objective functions and black-box optimization algorithms for bio-molecules
tools.detailed_description: A collection of baselines, objective functions, and black-box optimization algorithms specifically tailored for protein and small molecule engineering tasks.

tools.name: REINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular de novo design using RNNs and Reinforcement Learning
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of REINVENT, a pioneering tool for de novo molecular design using recurrent neural networks and reinforcement learning to generate optimized chemical structures.

tools.name: AliDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Target-aware molecule diffusion with exact energy optimization
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based model for generating molecules that align with specific targets using exact energy optimization techniques, presented at NeurIPS 2024.

tools.name: CGCF-ConfGen
tools.one_line_profile: Neural generative dynamics for molecular conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: A continuous normalizing flow-based model for generating diverse and low-energy molecular conformations, leveraging neural generative dynamics.

tools.name: ConfVAE
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end molecular conformation generation via bilevel programming
tools.detailed_description: A Variational Autoencoder (VAE) framework designed for molecular conformation generation, formulated as a bilevel programming problem to ensure geometric validity.

tools.name: GeoDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric diffusion model for molecular conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art geometric diffusion model for generating thermodynamically stable molecular conformations, respecting SE(3) equivariance.

tools.name: REINVENT4
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive AI tool for de novo molecular design and optimization
tools.detailed_description: The latest version of the REINVENT platform, offering advanced capabilities for de novo design, scaffold hopping, R-group replacement, and linker design using AI.

tools.name: MolScore
tools.one_line_profile: Automated scoring function for de novo molecular design evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive scoring framework to standardize and automate the evaluation of goal-directed generative models in drug discovery, integrating various docking and property prediction tools.

tools.name: SMILES-RNN
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES-based RNNs for reinforcement learning molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A repository implementing Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) based on SMILES strings for generating novel molecules via reinforcement learning.

tools.name: rlmolecule
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning library for material and molecule optimization
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to apply reinforcement learning techniques specifically for the optimization of materials and molecular structures, facilitating the discovery of novel compounds with desired properties.

tools.name: nvMolKit
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated library for computational chemistry tasks
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance library leveraging GPU acceleration for essential computational chemistry tasks including molecular similarity calculation, conformer generation, and geometry relaxation.

tools.name: NeVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for molecular graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the NeVAE model (AAAI 2019), a variational autoencoder designed for generating molecular graphs, enabling the exploration of chemical space.

tools.name: CSLVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph generative model for navigating combinatorial synthesis libraries
tools.detailed_description: Implements the Combinatorial Synthesis Library Variational Auto-Encoder (CSLVAE), an efficient graph generative model designed to navigate and generate molecules from ultra-large combinatorial synthesis libraries.

tools.name: FragGen
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-wise 3D structure-based molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating molecules in 3D space using a fragment-wise approach, ensuring reliable geometry and structure-based design capabilities.

tools.name: ResGen
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecular generation method
tools.detailed_description: A computational method for 3D molecular generation, focusing on creating valid molecular structures in three-dimensional space.

tools.name: SurfGen
tools.one_line_profile: Topological surface and geometric structure-based 3D molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: SurfGen leverages learning on topological surfaces and geometric structures to perform 3D molecular generation, integrating structural information into the design process.

tools.name: Drug Repurposing with TigerGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Drug repurposing using graph machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A project utilizing TigerGraph and Graph Machine Learning techniques to identify potential drug repurposing opportunities.

tools.name: paccmann_chemistry
tools.one_line_profile: Generative models of chemical data for PaccMann^RL
tools.detailed_description: Provides generative models and chemical data handling utilities specifically designed for the PaccMann^RL framework for drug design.

tools.name: paccmann_generator
tools.one_line_profile: Transcriptomic or protein-driven molecular design generator
tools.detailed_description: Generative models for molecular design that are driven by transcriptomic data or protein targets, part of the PaccMann ecosystem.

tools.name: paccmann_gp
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization with Gaussian processes for VAE latent space
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch and skopt-based implementation of Bayesian optimization using Gaussian processes, designed to optimize the latent spaces of Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) for generating molecules with desired properties.

tools.name: paccmann_kinase_binding_residues
tools.one_line_profile: Kinase binding residue analysis for affinity prediction and generation
tools.detailed_description: Code for comparing active site and full kinase sequences to improve drug-target affinity prediction and molecular generation tasks.

tools.name: NeuThera-Drug-Discovery-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Modular drug discovery starter toolkit with generative models
tools.detailed_description: A modular toolkit integrating state-of-the-art generative molecular design models (TamGen, chemBERTa, DeepPurpose) along with graph-based retrieval, molecular fingerprint embeddings, and ADMET profiling tools.

tools.name: SimGen
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot molecular generation via similarity kernels
tools.detailed_description: Implements a zero-shot molecular generation approach utilizing similarity kernels to generate novel molecules without extensive training on specific datasets.

tools.name: Drug-Combo-Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative models for drug combination generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model framework for generating drug combinations (graph sets) by leveraging hierarchical disease network embeddings.

tools.name: CREBM
tools.one_line_profile: Preference optimization for molecule synthesis with energy-based models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Conditional Residual Energy-based Models (CREBM) for preference optimization in molecule synthesis, as presented at ICML 2024.

tools.name: EMolCombiner
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-based molecule generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for de novo drug discovery that generates molecules by combining chemical fragments.

tools.name: LEADD
tools.one_line_profile: Lamarckian Evolutionary Algorithm for de novo Drug Design
tools.detailed_description: An evolutionary algorithm implementation specifically designed for de novo drug design, utilizing Lamarckian evolution principles to optimize molecular structures.

tools.name: FASMIFRA
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular generation by fast assembly of SMILES fragments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating molecules through the fast assembly of SMILES fragments, facilitating efficient exploration of chemical space.

tools.name: smi2sdf3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D diverse conformers generation using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A utility for generating diverse 3D molecular conformers from SMILES strings using RDKit, essential for structure-based modeling.

tools.name: 3DLinker
tools.one_line_profile: E(3) Equivariant Variational Autoencoder for molecular linker design
tools.detailed_description: An E(3) equivariant variational autoencoder designed specifically for the task of molecular linker design, generating 3D structures that link molecular fragments.

tools.name: LD-FPG
tools.one_line_profile: Generative modeling of full-atom protein conformations
tools.detailed_description: Official PyTorch implementation of 'Generative Modeling of Full-Atom Protein Conformations using Latent Diffusion on Graph Embeddings', enabling high-resolution protein structure generation.

tools.name: GEMCODE
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid generative AI for de novo design of co-crystals
tools.detailed_description: An automated screening pipeline leveraging a hybrid of generative AI and evolutionary optimization for the de novo design of pharmaceutical co-crystals with enhanced tabletability.

tools.name: GraphINVENT2
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based molecular generation library
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined package containing the core functionalities of GraphINVENT, a platform for graph-based molecular generation using graph neural networks and reinforcement learning.

tools.name: Cicero Word Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Control software for atomic physics experiments
tools.detailed_description: A user interface and control software suite designed for atomic physics experiments, capable of designing and running sequences on National Instruments digital and analog output cards.

tools.name: MolDQN-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization of molecules via deep reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the MolDQN algorithm for optimizing molecular properties using deep reinforcement learning.

tools.name: moo-denovo
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective optimization for de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated de novo design of drug-like molecular libraries using deep learning-based multi-objective optimization techniques.

tools.name: Mol-CycleGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for molecular optimization using CycleGAN architecture
tools.detailed_description: Mol-CycleGAN is a generative model designed for molecular optimization. It leverages the CycleGAN architecture to perform unpaired image-to-image translation tasks in the molecular domain, allowing for the generation of molecules with optimized properties while retaining structural similarity to the input.

tools.name: ORGANIC
tools.one_line_profile: Objective-Reinforced Generative Adversarial Networks for Inverse-design Chemistry
tools.detailed_description: ORGANIC is a framework for optimizing distributions of molecules using Objective-Reinforced Generative Adversarial Networks (ORGAN). It is designed for inverse design in chemistry, allowing for the generation of molecular structures with specific desired properties.

tools.name: STONED-SELFIES
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient molecular exploration and optimization algorithm using SELFIES
tools.detailed_description: This repository implements the STONED (Superfast Traversal, Optimization, Novelty, Exploration and Discovery) algorithm. It utilizes the SELFIES molecular representation to perform efficient traversal and optimization in the chemical space, serving as a fast baseline for molecular generative models.

tools.name: ChemSpaceAL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning methodology for protein-specific molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: ChemSpaceAL is a tool implementing an active learning methodology for protein-specific molecular generation. It integrates generative models with docking simulations to efficiently explore chemical space and propose novel ligands for specific protein targets.

tools.name: genmol
tools.one_line_profile: Library for molecular structure generation
tools.detailed_description: Genmol is a Python library designed for molecular structure generation. It provides functionalities to generate chemical structures, likely utilizing generative models to assist in drug discovery and chemical space exploration.

tools.name: MolEvol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule optimization via explainable evolution
tools.detailed_description: MolEvol implements a method for molecule optimization using explainable evolutionary algorithms. It aims to optimize molecular properties while providing interpretability in the generative process, useful for rational drug design.

tools.name: DrugAssist
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Model for molecule optimization
tools.detailed_description: DrugAssist is a Large Language Model (LLM) designed for molecule optimization. It treats molecular optimization as a translation task, enabling the generation of optimized molecules based on textual or structural prompts, facilitating human-in-the-loop drug design.

tools.name: DEG
tools.one_line_profile: Data-efficient graph grammar learning for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework implementing graph grammar learning for efficient molecular generation, particularly effective in low-data regimes. It automates the extraction of production rules from molecular datasets to guide the generation process.

tools.name: GraphDG
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for molecular distance geometry
tools.detailed_description: A generative model designed to produce molecular conformations by predicting distance geometries. It leverages graph neural networks to model the spatial relationships between atoms in a molecule.

tools.name: Scaffold Hopping WHALES
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold hopping and virtual screening using WHALES descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for drug discovery that performs scaffold hopping and virtual screening. It utilizes WHALES (Weighted Holistic Atom-Localization and Entity Shape) descriptors to identify chemically diverse molecular scaffolds with similar biological activities.

tools.name: Guacamole
tools.one_line_profile: Spark-based somatic variant calling and local assembly
tools.detailed_description: A somatic variant caller built on Apache Spark, designed for high-throughput sequencing data. It supports multi-sample calling (including RNA-seq) and local assembly to identify genetic variants.

tools.name: GDSS
tools.one_line_profile: Score-based generative modeling of graphs via stochastic differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A score-based generative framework for graphs that utilizes a system of stochastic differential equations (SDEs). It is designed to generate molecular graphs by modeling the diffusion process in the graph space.

tools.name: DiffLinker
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant 3D-conditional diffusion model for molecular linker design
tools.detailed_description: A 3D-conditional diffusion model specifically designed for molecular linker design. It generates molecular fragments that connect two or more disconnected substructures while maintaining E(3) equivariance.

tools.name: ZOLA-3D
tools.one_line_profile: Zernike Optimized Localization Algorithm for 3D single molecule localizations
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for 3D single-molecule localization microscopy. It uses Zernike polynomials to model the point spread function (PSF) and optimize localization precision, enabling high-resolution 3D imaging.

tools.name: BiAAE
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular generation for desired transcriptome changes
tools.detailed_description: A generative model using Adversarial Autoencoders (AAE) to design molecules that induce specific transcriptomic changes. It bridges chemical structure generation with biological gene expression profiles.

tools.name: GGM
tools.one_line_profile: Graph generative model for molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A graph-based generative model designed for the de novo generation of small molecular graphs. It focuses on learning the distribution of molecular structures to generate chemically valid compounds.

tools.name: GB-GM
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based generative model for molecules
tools.detailed_description: A graph-based generative model developed by the Jensen Group for molecular generation. It constructs molecules atom-by-atom or fragment-by-fragment using graph representations.

tools.name: Graph Protein Design
tools.one_line_profile: Generative models for graph-based protein design
tools.detailed_description: A generative framework for protein design that represents proteins as graphs. It learns to generate amino acid sequences that fold into desired 3D structures, leveraging graph neural networks for structure-sequence modeling.

tools.name: DiffHopp
tools.one_line_profile: Graph diffusion model for scaffold hopping
tools.detailed_description: A graph diffusion model specifically tailored for scaffold hopping in drug design. It generates novel molecular scaffolds while preserving key structural features and interactions of the original molecule.

tools.name: gruenifai
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive multi-parameter optimization of molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool for interactive multi-parameter optimization of molecules in a continuous vector space. It allows users to navigate the chemical space and optimize molecules based on multiple properties simultaneously.

tools.name: MSO
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient multi-objective molecular optimization
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) for efficient multi-objective optimization of molecules in a continuous latent space. It is designed to find molecules that satisfy multiple property constraints.

tools.name: Molecule Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective de novo drug design with conditional graph generation
tools.detailed_description: A conditional graph generative model for multi-objective de novo drug design. It generates molecular graphs conditioned on desired properties, enabling the targeted design of drug-like molecules.

tools.name: MolGAN-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of MolGAN for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of MolGAN, an implicit generative model for small molecular graphs. It uses Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to generate molecular structures directly.

tools.name: RGFN
tools.one_line_profile: Synthesizable molecular generation model using GFlowNets
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the RGFN (Robust GFlowNet) model for generating synthesizable molecules, as presented in NeurIPS 2024. It focuses on ensuring the chemical validity and synthesizability of generated molecular structures.

tools.name: Graph-DiT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Diffusion Transformer for multi-conditional molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing Graph Diffusion Transformers to generate molecular structures conditioned on multiple properties, aiming to improve the controllability of de novo drug design.

tools.name: fragment-based-dgm
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for fragment-based molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a deep generative model that constructs molecules by combining fragments, as described in the AISTATS 2020 paper. It is designed for efficient exploration of chemical space using fragment-based strategies.

tools.name: MoLeR
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold-constrained molecular generation model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MoLeR, a graph-based generative model for molecules. It supports scaffold-constrained generation, allowing users to generate molecules that contain a specific core structure, which is critical for lead optimization in drug discovery.

tools.name: RuSH
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold Hopping with Generative Reinforcement Learning for drug design
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of RuSH (Scaffold Hopping with Generative Reinforcement Learning). Includes ScaffoldFinder algorithm for 2D decoration identification, 3D shape-based scoring with ROCS, and scoring plugins for REINVENT. Enables structure-guided molecular generation for drug design.

tools.name: S4-Drug-Design
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical language modeling with structured state space sequence models
tools.detailed_description: The official codebase of the paper 'Chemical language modeling with structured state space sequence models'. It applies Structured State Space Sequence (S4) models to de novo drug design and molecular generation tasks.

tools.name: MOSES
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Platform for Molecular Generation Models
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Sets (MOSES) is a benchmarking platform to support research on machine learning for drug discovery. It implements several popular molecular generation models and provides a standard dataset and metrics for evaluation.

tools.name: ChemTSv2
tools.one_line_profile: Refined Python implementation of ChemTS for de novo molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A refined and extended version of ChemTS, a tool for de novo molecule generation using Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) and Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN). It facilitates the exploration of chemical space for drug discovery.

tools.name: MolGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit generative model for small molecular graphs
tools.detailed_description: Tensorflow implementation of MolGAN, an implicit generative model for small molecular graphs. It uses Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and Reinforcement Learning to generate molecular graphs with desired properties.

tools.name: Modof
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Modof for Molecule Optimization
tools.detailed_description: The implementation of Modof, a framework for molecule optimization. It is designed to modify molecular structures to optimize specific properties for drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: OpenFF Recharge
tools.one_line_profile: Automated framework for generating optimized partial charges for molecules
tools.detailed_description: An automated framework for generating optimized partial charges for molecules, developed by the Open Force Field Initiative. It supports the parameterization of force fields for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: TransVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer Based VAE Architecture for De Novo Molecular Design
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based Variational Autoencoder (VAE) architecture designed for de novo molecular design. It leverages attention mechanisms to generate novel molecular structures.

tools.name: GAML
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic Algorithm Machine Learning for automated force field parameterization
tools.detailed_description: Genetic Algorithm Machine Learning (GAML) software package for automated force field parameterization. It aids in optimizing parameters for computational chemistry simulations.

tools.name: Deep-Drug-Coder
tools.one_line_profile: Generative neural network for de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: A tensorflow.keras generative neural network for de novo drug design. It was developed to generate novel chemical structures with drug-like properties.

tools.name: lammps_interface
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic generation of LAMMPS input files for MOFs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automatic generation of LAMMPS input files for molecular dynamics simulations of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs). It simplifies the setup process for complex material simulations.

tools.name: ConsensusCruncher
tools.one_line_profile: Error suppression in NGS data using unique molecular identifiers
tools.detailed_description: ConsensusCruncher is a tool that suppresses errors in next-generation sequencing (NGS) data by using unique molecular identifiers (UMIs) to amalgamate reads derived from the same DNA template into a consensus sequence.

tools.name: QuantumMolGAN-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum Generative Adversarial Networks for Generative Chemistry
tools.detailed_description: Source code for 'Exploring the Advantages of Quantum Generative Adversarial Networks in Generative Chemistry'. It implements a Quantum GAN for molecular generation tasks.

tools.name: Semla-Flow
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient 3D molecular generation with flow-matching and Semla
tools.detailed_description: Implements efficient 3D molecular generation using flow-matching techniques integrated with Semla. It is designed for generating 3D molecular conformers or structures.

tools.name: GraphVAE-Approx
tools.one_line_profile: Non-autoregressive graph variational autoencoder for molecular graph generation
tools.detailed_description: An efficient learning framework for non-autoregressive Graph Variational Autoencoders (GraphVAE) designed for molecular graph generation, addressing computational bottlenecks in graph generation tasks.

tools.name: ETFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant flow matching for molecular conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: A method for generating molecular conformers using equivariant flow matching, ensuring geometric consistency and high-quality 3D structure generation.

tools.name: LS-MolGen
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand-and-structure dual-driven deep reinforcement learning for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep reinforcement learning method for target-specific molecular generation that utilizes both ligand and structure information to guide the generation process.

tools.name: Matbench Genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking metrics for generative materials models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing standardized metrics for evaluating generative models in materials science, inspired by Guacamol and CDVAE benchmarks.

tools.name: DeepFMPO
tools.one_line_profile: Deep reinforcement learning for multiparameter optimization in de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: A framework using deep reinforcement learning for optimizing multiple parameters simultaneously in de novo drug design, facilitating the generation of molecules with desired properties.

tools.name: GDiffRetro
tools.one_line_profile: Retrosynthesis prediction with dual graph enhanced molecular representation and diffusion generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for retrosynthesis prediction that combines dual graph enhanced molecular representations with diffusion-based generation techniques.

tools.name: MolScribe
tools.one_line_profile: Robust molecular structure recognition from images
tools.detailed_description: A tool for Optical Chemical Structure Recognition (OCSR) that converts images of chemical structures into molecular graphs/SMILES using an image-to-graph generation approach.

tools.name: LSTM_Chem
tools.one_line_profile: Generative recurrent networks for de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a generative LSTM-based model for de novo drug design, capable of generating novel chemical structures with desired properties.

tools.name: Molecular VAE
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven continuous representation of molecules
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Variational Autoencoder (VAE) for molecular design, enabling the conversion of discrete molecular representations into a continuous latent space for optimization.

tools.name: GATNN-VS
tools.one_line_profile: Neural representation learning for scaffold hopping in virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing Graph Attention Networks (GAT) for improved scaffold hopping in ligand-based virtual screening, enhancing the discovery of novel chemotypes.

tools.name: ChemTS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule design using Monte Carlo Tree Search with Neural Rollout
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for de novo molecule design that combines Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) with a Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) to generate molecules with optimized properties.

tools.name: Moltiverse
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular conformer generation using enhanced sampling methods
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating molecular conformers using enhanced sampling techniques, implemented in Crystal, aimed at exploring conformational space efficiently.

tools.name: REINVENT-GDB13
tools.one_line_profile: RNN model for generating molecules from GDB-13 space
tools.detailed_description: Part of the REINVENT ecosystem, this tool uses a Recurrent Neural Network to generate molecules, specifically trained on the GDB-13 database of small organic molecules.

tools.name: REINVENT-Randomized
tools.one_line_profile: RNN using randomized SMILES for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the REINVENT framework that utilizes randomized SMILES strings during training to improve the diversity and quality of generated molecules.

tools.name: REINVENT-Scaffold-Decorator
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES-based encoder-decoder for molecular scaffold decoration
tools.detailed_description: A tool within the REINVENT family for scaffold decoration, using an encoder-decoder architecture to generate molecules by elaborating on a given core scaffold.

tools.name: GGM-metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation metrics for graph generative models
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a suite of evaluation metrics for graph generative models, essential for benchmarking performance in molecular generation and other graph-based tasks.

tools.name: GenerativeLEGO
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for constructing graphs using fragment assembly
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for generating graph structures (specifically molecular graphs) by assembling sub-graph components, analogous to LEGO blocks. It focuses on fragment-based molecular generation.

tools.name: hgraph2graph
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical generation of molecular graphs using structural motifs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for generating molecular graphs by assembling higher-order structural motifs (fragments) rather than atom-by-atom, ensuring better chemical validity and structural coherence.

tools.name: JT-VAE
tools.one_line_profile: Junction Tree Variational Autoencoder for molecular graph generation
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of the Junction Tree Variational Autoencoder (JT-VAE), a seminal model that generates molecular graphs by first generating a junction tree of chemical substructures and then assembling them into a full molecule, guaranteeing 100% validity.

tools.name: CoarseGrainingVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric super-resolution for molecular geometries
tools.detailed_description: A Variational Autoencoder (VAE) based framework for performing geometric super-resolution on molecules. It learns to map coarse-grained molecular representations back to fine-grained all-atom geometries.

tools.name: MolGAN-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of MolGAN for small molecular graph generation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of MolGAN, an implicit generative model for small molecular graphs that uses Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and reinforcement learning objectives to generate molecules with desired properties.

tools.name: MolGen
tools.one_line_profile: Domain-agnostic molecular generation with chemical feedback
tools.detailed_description: A molecular generation framework that integrates chemical feedback into the generation process. It employs self-feedback mechanisms to optimize the validity and properties of generated molecules, often leveraging language model architectures.

tools.name: MolReasoner
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph enhanced molecular reasoning model for interpretable drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: MolReasoner is a framework that combines molecular large language models with knowledge graphs to enable effective and interpretable reasoning for molecular tasks. It addresses the limitations of LLMs in domain-specific reasoning by integrating structured knowledge.

tools.name: im4MEC
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable deep learning model for endometrial cancer classification from histology images
tools.detailed_description: im4MEC is a deep learning framework designed to predict the molecular classification of endometrial cancer using haematoxylin and eosin-stained whole-slide images. It emphasizes interpretability in medical image analysis.

tools.name: GraphSVX
tools.one_line_profile: Shapley value-based explanation method for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: GraphSVX is a post-hoc explanation method for Graph Neural Networks that captures node and feature importance using Shapley values. It provides a unified framework for explaining GNN predictions, particularly useful in molecular graph analysis.

tools.name: SigDigger
tools.one_line_profile: Digital signal analyzer for inspecting and analyzing radio signals
tools.detailed_description: SigDigger is a free digital signal analyzer based on Suscan and Sigutils. It allows users to inspect, analyze, and demodulate radio signals, serving as a tool for physics and engineering signal processing tasks.

tools.name: EchoGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable Graph Neural Networks for cardiac ejection fraction estimation
tools.detailed_description: EchoGNN is a graph neural network-based model designed for estimating ejection fraction from echocardiograms. It incorporates explainability mechanisms to highlight relevant cardiac structures.

tools.name: D4Explainer
tools.one_line_profile: In-distribution GNN explanations via discrete denoising diffusion
tools.detailed_description: D4Explainer is a generative graph explainer that uses discrete denoising diffusion probabilistic models to generate counterfactual explanations for Graph Neural Networks. It aims to provide in-distribution graph explanations.

tools.name: GraphFramEx
tools.one_line_profile: Systematic evaluation framework for GNN explainability methods
tools.detailed_description: GraphFramEx is a comprehensive framework designed to evaluate and benchmark various explainability methods for Graph Neural Networks. It provides standard metrics and datasets to assess the quality of GNN explanations.

tools.name: STExplainer
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable Spatio-Temporal Graph Neural Networks framework
tools.detailed_description: STExplainer is a framework for providing explanations for spatio-temporal graph neural networks. It identifies salient spatial and temporal patterns that contribute to model predictions, applicable in domains like traffic flow or environmental monitoring.

tools.name: UQ4DD
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification library specifically designed for Drug Discovery pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by MolecularAI (AstraZeneca) to provide uncertainty quantification methods for drug discovery models, enabling reliability assessment in molecular property prediction.

tools.name: LIT (Learning Interpretability Tool)
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive platform for visualizing and understanding ML model behavior
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform for visualization and understanding of machine learning models. It supports debugging, error analysis, and interpretability for various data types including text and tabular data used in scientific modeling.

tools.name: GNNExplainer
tools.one_line_profile: Model-agnostic explanation method for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: The reference implementation of GNNExplainer, a tool that provides interpretable explanations for predictions made by any Graph Neural Network, widely used in molecular graph analysis.

tools.name: GNNExplainer_DGL
tools.one_line_profile: DGL implementation of GNNExplainer for graph model interpretability
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the GNNExplainer algorithm using the Deep Graph Library (DGL), facilitating interpretability for DGL-based molecular models.

tools.name: ReFine
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-grained explainability method for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ReFine, a method for generating multi-grained explanations for GNN predictions, applicable to understanding molecular graph embeddings.

tools.name: chemprop (Evidential)
tools.one_line_profile: Chemprop fork with fast and scalable uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A specialized version of Chemprop that implements Evidential Deep Learning for scalable uncertainty quantification in molecular property prediction and virtual screening.

tools.name: StableGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for autonomous learning of explainable graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to learn stable and explainable Graph Neural Networks, addressing causality and interpretability in graph-based learning tasks.

tools.name: QuickBind
tools.one_line_profile: Light-weight and interpretable molecular docking model
tools.detailed_description: A molecular docking tool that emphasizes interpretability and efficiency in predicting binding conformations and affinities.

tools.name: WebPlotDigitizer
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based tool to extract numerical data from plot images
tools.detailed_description: A widely used tool in scientific research for extracting underlying numerical data from images of plots and charts found in papers, enabling data recovery and re-analysis.

tools.name: Graph Network Explainability
tools.one_line_profile: Explainability techniques for Graph Networks in chemistry
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of explainability techniques (like Gradient-based methods) for Graph Convolutional Networks, specifically demonstrated on organic chemistry tasks and molecular graphs.

tools.name: Transformers Interpret
tools.one_line_profile: Model explainability tool for Hugging Face Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A library to explain the output of Transformer models. While generic, it is applicable to scientific transformer models (e.g., in protein language models or SMILES transformers) for interpretability analysis.

tools.name: Puncc
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for predictive uncertainty quantification using conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: Puncc (Predictive UNcertainty Calibration and Conformalization) is a library designed to assess the reliability of machine learning models by providing uncertainty quantification metrics and conformal prediction methods.

tools.name: DIG
tools.one_line_profile: Dive into Graphs: A library for graph deep learning research and interpretability
tools.detailed_description: DIG is a library for graph deep learning that includes unified implementations of data interfaces, common algorithms, and evaluation metrics, with a strong focus on graph generation and interpretability (XAI) for molecular graphs.

tools.name: PGExplainer
tools.one_line_profile: Parameterized Explainer for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of PGExplainer, a method for explaining the predictions of Graph Neural Networks, often used for interpreting molecular property predictions.

tools.name: Uncertainty Baselines
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality implementations of standard and SOTA uncertainty quantification methods
tools.detailed_description: A library providing implementations of various uncertainty quantification methods across different tasks, serving as a benchmark and toolkit for research in reliable machine learning.

tools.name: crepes
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for conformal prediction and calibration
tools.detailed_description: Crepes (Conformal Regressors and Predictive Systems) is a Python package that implements conformal prediction methods to produce valid prediction intervals and assess model calibration.

tools.name: Inseq
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretability toolkit for sequence generation models
tools.detailed_description: Inseq is a library for interpreting sequence generation models, allowing users to visualize and analyze feature attributions, applicable to biological sequence models (e.g., proteins, SMILES).

tools.name: CrysXPP
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable property predictor for crystalline materials
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed for predicting properties of crystalline materials with a focus on explainability, allowing researchers to understand feature importance in material structures.

tools.name: ChemArr
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed Chemprop model with Arrhenius equation
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the Chemprop model that incorporates the Arrhenius equation into the output layer to add physical constraints and interpretability to molecular property predictions.

tools.name: Gauche (Chemistry)
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Process library for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to facilitate the use of Gaussian Processes in chemistry, providing tools for uncertainty quantification and molecular property prediction.

tools.name: DL4SWAT
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for SWAT model calibration
tools.detailed_description: A scalable deep learning framework specifically designed for the calibration of the Soil and Water Assessment Tool (SWAT), aiding in hydrological modeling.

tools.name: EEGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Brain connectivity investigation with GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network framework for analyzing EEG data to investigate brain connectivity, incorporating GNNExplainer for interpretability.

tools.name: GCFExplainer
tools.one_line_profile: Global Counterfactual Explainer for GNNs
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for generating global counterfactual explanations for Graph Neural Networks, helping to understand model decision boundaries in graph-based tasks.

tools.name: Captum
tools.one_line_profile: Model interpretability library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for model interpretability and understanding in PyTorch, offering various algorithms to attribute model predictions to input features.

tools.name: GraphXAI
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for GNN explainers
tools.detailed_description: A library and dataset collection designed to support the development and evaluation of explainability methods for Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: GCNN-Explainability
tools.one_line_profile: Explainability methods for Graph CNNs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of explainability methods for Graph Convolutional Neural Networks, providing tools to visualize and understand graph model predictions.

tools.name: GNN-SubNet
tools.one_line_profile: Disease subnetwork detection with explainable GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting disease-relevant subnetworks within biological networks using explainable Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: explain_graphs
tools.one_line_profile: Explainability methods for GCNNs (CVPR 2019)
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for explainability methods applied to Graph Convolutional Neural Networks, enabling analysis of graph classification models.

tools.name: WaveBlocks
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization framework for optics and deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework for the joint optimization and calibration of optical systems and deep learning models, facilitating computational optics research.

tools.name: MAPIE
tools.one_line_profile: A scikit-learn-compatible library for uncertainty quantification using conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: MAPIE (Model Agnostic Prediction Interval Estimator) allows for estimating prediction intervals and controlling risks for regression and classification tasks. It implements conformal prediction methods to provide rigorous uncertainty quantification for machine learning models.

tools.name: ADMET-AI
tools.one_line_profile: ADMET property prediction platform using Chemprop
tools.detailed_description: ADMET-AI provides a trained Chemprop-based model for predicting Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity (ADMET) properties of molecules. It offers both a Python API and a web interface for fast and accurate profiling of drug candidates.

tools.name: tridesclous
tools.one_line_profile: Offline and online spike sorting tool for electrophysiology
tools.detailed_description: Tridesclous is a toolkit for spike sorting, designed to process extracellular recordings from multi-electrode arrays. It provides a complete pipeline including signal preprocessing, peak detection, feature extraction, clustering, and template matching for neuroscience research.

tools.name: exmol
tools.one_line_profile: Counterfactual explanations for molecular property prediction models
tools.detailed_description: Exmol is a library for explaining black-box molecular property prediction models. It generates counterfactual examples (similar molecules with different properties) to provide interpretability for chemical machine learning models.

tools.name: SLM4Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative benchmark and analysis suite for molecular large language models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite designed to evaluate Molecular Large Language Models (MolLLMs) across various downstream tasks in drug discovery and chemistry, facilitating quantitative analysis of model capabilities.

tools.name: MolGenBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for real-world applicability of molecular generative models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate molecular generative models with a focus on real-world applicability, covering tasks from de novo design to lead optimization.

tools.name: BigSMILES_homopolymer
tools.one_line_profile: Automated BigSMILES conversion workflow for homopolymers
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool for converting homopolymeric macromolecules into the BigSMILES representation, facilitating the handling and analysis of polymer data.

tools.name: PoseX
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for molecular docking and pose prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite specifically designed for evaluating molecular docking algorithms and pose prediction models, providing datasets and metrics for assessment.

tools.name: ogb_lite
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight version of the Open Graph Benchmark (OGB)
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight implementation of the Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) library that removes the dependency on PyTorch, facilitating graph learning benchmarks in diverse environments.

tools.name: CBGBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for protein-molecule complex binding graph analysis
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite titled 'Fill in the Blank of Protein-Molecule Complex Binding Graph', designed to evaluate models on their ability to understand and predict interactions in protein-ligand complexes.

tools.name: MolCap-Arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for language-enhanced molecular property prediction and captioning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating models on molecular captioning and language-enhanced molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: astartes
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for rigorous data splitting in machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for creating rigorous and reproducible data splits for machine learning, with specific support for chemical and scientific datasets (e.g., scaffold splitting).

tools.name: SL_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for synthetic lethality prediction methods
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking study and codebase for evaluating various machine learning methods in the prediction of synthetic lethality, a key concept in cancer drug target discovery.

tools.name: MolPuzzle
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal benchmark for molecular structure elucidation with LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset and framework designed to test the capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) in solving molecular puzzles, specifically focusing on molecular structure elucidation from multimodal data.

tools.name: MolData
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for disease and target-based molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating machine learning models on molecular datasets specifically curated for disease and target-based drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: Levenshtein SMILES Augmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Data augmentation library for chemical reaction datasets using Levenshtein distance
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to perform data augmentation on SMILES strings for chemical reactions. It utilizes Levenshtein distance to generate variations, helping to improve the robustness and generalization of machine learning models trained on reaction data.

tools.name: paccmann_datasets
tools.one_line_profile: Data loading utilities for PaccMann drug sensitivity prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A library providing PyTorch dataset classes and data handling utilities for the PaccMann ecosystem, facilitating the training of models for anticancer drug sensitivity prediction using multi-modal data.

tools.name: nonbonded
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for optimizing and benchmarking molecular force fields
tools.detailed_description: A management system and toolkit designed for the optimization and benchmarking of molecular force fields against physical property data. It automates the parameterization process for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: MUBen
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for uncertainty quantification in molecular representation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite designed to evaluate the performance of Uncertainty Quantification (UQ) methods applied to molecular representation models. It aims to standardize the assessment of model reliability in cheminformatics.

tools.name: Tartarus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for realistic inverse molecular design
tools.detailed_description: Tartarus is a comparative benchmarking platform designed for inverse molecular design tasks. It focuses on realistic and practical scenarios, evaluating generative models not just on chemical validity but on their ability to optimize for complex, multi-objective properties relevant to drug discovery.

tools.name: ChemGAN-challenge
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark code for ChemGAN drug discovery challenge
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the code and datasets for the ChemGAN challenge, which evaluates the ability of AI models (specifically GANs) to reproduce natural chemical diversity in drug discovery contexts. It serves as a reproduction suite and benchmark for generative chemistry.

tools.name: MDBenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate, start, and analyze molecular dynamics benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: MDBenchmark is a command-line tool designed to automate the benchmarking of molecular dynamics (MD) simulations. It helps researchers quickly generate run configurations, submit jobs, and analyze performance metrics (ns/day) across different hardware or parameters.

tools.name: Chemprop Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking scripts and data for Chemprop
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the benchmarking scripts and datasets used to evaluate the performance of the Chemprop model (v1). It provides a standardized environment for reproducing reported results and comparing molecular property prediction models.

tools.name: Admetica
tools.one_line_profile: ADMET property evaluation tool for Datagrok
tools.detailed_description: Admetica is a repository (likely a plugin or package) for the Datagrok platform, focused on the evaluation of ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity) properties of molecules. It facilitates the assessment of drug candidates.

tools.name: DeepGene
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tools for genomic datasets in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: DeepGene is a toolkit under the DeepChem ecosystem designed for working with genomic datasets. It aims to apply deep learning techniques to genomics for drug discovery purposes, providing specialized data handling and modeling capabilities.

tools.name: DockString
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and benchmark for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: DockString is a Python package and dataset that facilitates realistic benchmarks for drug discovery. It provides a highly curated dataset of molecular docking scores and poses, along with tools to perform docking and evaluate machine learning models on these tasks.

tools.name: HydroNet
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark tasks for preserving long-range interactions in molecular models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite consisting of tasks designed to test the ability of machine learning models to preserve long-range interactions and structural motifs in molecular data, specifically focusing on water clusters.

tools.name: SEAL_OGB
tools.one_line_profile: SEAL implementation for Open Graph Benchmark link prediction
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation of the SEAL (Subgraphs, Embeddings, and Attributes for Link prediction) framework, specifically optimized for and evaluated on the Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) datasets.

tools.name: OGB-LSC PCQM4Mv2 (Graphcore)
tools.one_line_profile: Graphcore's solution for OGB Large Scale Challenge PCQM4Mv2
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Graph Neural Networks optimized for IPUs, designed for the OGB Large Scale Challenge (OGB-LSC) on the PCQM4Mv2 quantum chemistry dataset.

tools.name: Guacamole (Hammerlab)
tools.one_line_profile: Spark-based somatic variant calling tool
tools.detailed_description: A somatic variant caller for next-generation sequencing data, built on Apache Spark to enable distributed processing of large genomic datasets.

tools.name: Molecule Chef
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for synthesizable molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing a generative model designed to search for and generate molecules that are chemically synthesizable, based on the paper 'A Model to Search for Synthesizable Molecules'.

tools.name: mlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating machine learning interatomic potentials for materials, providing datasets and evaluation metrics for various material systems.

tools.name: FS-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Few-shot learning benchmark for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and benchmark suite for few-shot learning in drug discovery, containing molecular compounds with activity measurements against various protein targets, designed to evaluate models on low-data tasks.

tools.name: Polaris
tools.one_line_profile: Hub for AI models, datasets, and benchmarks in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A platform and library designed to foster the development of impactful AI models in drug discovery. It provides a hub for hosting datasets, benchmarks, and models, facilitating reproduction and comparison of ADMET and other drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: Smiles2Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multi-task dataset for ML-based molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: An open large-scale multi-task dataset designed for machine learning-based molecular docking research. It supports the development and benchmarking of models for predicting molecular binding poses and interactions.

tools.name: DrugOOD
tools.one_line_profile: OOD Dataset Curator and Benchmark for AI-aided Drug Discovery
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark and dataset curator for Out-Of-Distribution (OOD) generalization in AI-aided drug discovery. It provides tools to curate datasets with various domain shifts and evaluate model robustness.

tools.name: MOOD
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for molecular out-of-distribution generalization
tools.detailed_description: MOOD (Molecular Out-Of-Distribution) is a benchmark framework designed to evaluate the robustness and generalization of machine learning models in drug discovery. It provides diverse data splitting protocols and metrics to simulate realistic discovery scenarios where test data differs distributionally from training data.

tools.name: GT4SD Molecular Design
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI pipeline for target-based molecular design
tools.detailed_description: Part of the Generative Toolkit for Scientific Discovery (GT4SD), this repository focuses on pipelines for generating molecules tailored to specific targets, leveraging various generative models.

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Virtual Screening
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual screening tools and workflows for the Squonk computational platform
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and Nextflow workflows for virtual screening, including docking and ligand preparation, designed to run on the Squonk2 platform.

tools.name: REINVENT (Legacy)
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular de novo design using RNNs and Reinforcement Learning
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of REINVENT, a tool for de novo molecular design using recurrent neural networks and reinforcement learning to generate molecules with desired properties.

tools.name: DockStream
tools.one_line_profile: A docking wrapper to enhance de novo molecular design pipelines
tools.detailed_description: DockStream provides a unified interface to various molecular docking software, facilitating their integration into generative molecular design workflows (like REINVENT) for scoring and optimization.

tools.name: AiZynthFinder
tools.one_line_profile: A tool for retrosynthetic planning using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: AiZynthFinder is a tool for retrosynthetic planning that uses Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) combined with neural networks to predict reaction templates and solve synthesis routes.

tools.name: SmartCADD
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source virtual screening platform combining DL, CADD, and QM
tools.detailed_description: SmartCADD is a virtual screening platform that integrates deep learning, traditional computer-aided drug design (CADD), and quantum mechanics methodologies into a unified Python framework for drug discovery.

tools.name: ACPC
tools.one_line_profile: Chemoinformatics tool for ligand-based virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: ACPC (Auto-Correlation of Partial Charges) is a tool for ligand-based virtual screening that utilizes physicochemical property fields to compare molecules.

tools.name: VirtualFlow for Ligand Preparation (VFLP)
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for large-scale ligand preparation
tools.detailed_description: VFLP is a module of the VirtualFlow platform dedicated to the preparation of ligand libraries for virtual screening, handling tasks like format conversion and protonation.

tools.name: VirtualFlow Utility (VFU)
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlined version of VirtualFlow combining screening and preparation
tools.detailed_description: VFU combines the functionalities of VirtualFlow for Virtual Screening (VFVS) and Ligand Preparation (VFLP) into a more streamlined utility for managing drug discovery workflows.

tools.name: VirtualFlow for Virtual Screening (VFVS)
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for ultra-large-scale virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: VFVS is a workflow platform designed for ultra-large-scale virtual screening on computer clusters, supporting various docking programs and managing massive ligand libraries.

tools.name: AIAgents4Pharma
tools.one_line_profile: AI Agents framework for pharmaceutical R&D automation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for building and deploying AI agents to automate various tasks in drug discovery and development, facilitating interaction with data and tools.

tools.name: DrugEx (XuhanLiu)
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for multi-objective drug design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for de novo drug design using deep learning, featuring Pareto-based multi-objective optimization to balance polypharmacology and other properties.

tools.name: AutoGrow4
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-automated computer-aided drug discovery using genetic algorithms
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program for semi-automated computer-aided drug discovery that uses a genetic algorithm to evolve predicted ligands on demand, generating novel drug-like molecules and optimizing preexisting ligands.

tools.name: OpenVS
tools.one_line_profile: AI accelerated virtual screening platform for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A platform combining artificial intelligence with traditional virtual screening methods to accelerate the drug discovery process, providing scripts and codes for high-throughput screening tasks.

tools.name: AlzyFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based platform for ligand-based virtual screening and network pharmacology
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform designed for ligand-based virtual screening and network pharmacology analysis, facilitating the identification of potential drug candidates.

tools.name: DataWarrior
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive data analysis and visualization with chemical intelligence
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program for interactive data analysis and visualization that understands chemical structures, widely used for exploring structure-activity relationships (SAR) in drug discovery.
